content:
sebastiaanspeck opened PR #7959 from sebastiaanspeck:patch-1 to bytecodealliance:main:

The construction before was readable in the GitHub Action itself, but IMO the descriptions in the opened PRâ€™s are not as pretty to read. This will fix this by making every sentence on one line.
